comment.author: 66733752@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called CCC Architecture, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 40147761@N04
comment._content: Absolutely Beautiful.! I love being able to see these. My hope is that people will post pictures of these things today and we can link them through the comments. They made so many wonderful things for us to enjoy. So many of their projects are being lost, forgotten, rebuilt and destroyed. I feel an urgency to get people to seek out and photograph these bits of our history. Hi, I'm an admin for a group called CCC, Civilian Conservation Corps Photos, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
